## Machine-Readable Endpoints

For LLM consumption, the following formats are available:

- Sitemap XML: https://grimlock.ai/sitemap-index.xml
- Sitemap TXT: https://grimlock.ai/sitemap.txt (plain URL list)
- Sitemap MD: https://grimlock.ai/sitemap.md (titles and descriptions)
- Raw Markdown API: https://grimlock.ai/api/[slug].md

Example: https://grimlock.ai/api/digital-familiar.md returns the raw markdown content.
